QuestData.Title: We Die Laughing!
QuestData.Description: Are you here to help or hinder?$b$bThis village is being eaten, and we must move quickly to salvage what we can.$b$bGather the masks of our fallen Laughing Skull brothers and sisters and meet me on the western side of the village.$b$bI will need them if our clan is to rebuild.
QuestData.RewardText: These are more than fancy facewear. With a mask and some proper incentive, we can make anyone a Laughing Skull.
